headline: Assi Ghat Aarti Timings (Morning & Evening) – 2025
description: The exact Assi Ghat aarti time for the morning (Subah-e-Banaras) and evening ceremonies in 2025. Get a month-by-month schedule, pro tips, and more.

mainEntity.name: Do the Assi Ghat Ganga Aarti timings change on festival days?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes—on Dev Deepawali & Kartik Purnima the evening slot shifts later so the flame-arches align with the full-moon rise. Arrive 90 minutes early to get a spot.

mainEntity.name: Is the Assi Ghat morning aarti time ever cancelled for rain?

acceptedAnswer.text: Rarely. If it's raining heavily, the priests move the ceremony to a covered dais. The public yoga session may be skipped, but the aarti continues.

mainEntity.name: Can tourists participate in the aarti?

acceptedAnswer.text: While you can't perform the main ritual, you can receive a blessing from the priests afterward. Simply queue politely to the left of the stage once the ceremony concludes.
